ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank the EHPs who participated in the study and the South African Medical Research Council and National Research Foundation for funding the study. Angela Mathee, Caradee Wright and Renee Street received research funding support from the National Research Foundation.

sec.title: Funding
sec.p: The study was funded by the South African Medical Research Council and the National Research Foundation. The funders had no role in the design of the study and collection, analysis, and interpretation of data and in writing the manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets analysed during the current study are available from the corresponding author on reasonable request.
